name: Divine Law
description:
A cherub must stop the serpent from re-entering the Garden of Eden at all costs. Failure will not be tolerated, so anything goes, even if it means defying the laws of physics.

All images, sounds, and music, are 100% made by us (David and Sarah).

Controls:

Arrows or WASD: Move

Numbers 1-4: Break the laws of physics

You may only break one law of physics at a time.
